title: Nerves
description: Meet me - David – a jittery student nurse who thought entering a roommate carer scheme was a brilliant idea. Meet Ryan – skate-punk extraordinaire with a penchant for chucking himself off vert ramps. In his wheelchair. Oh Lordy, that's got to hurt.Status: In progress/IncompleteLast update: 4/12/2010Word count: approx. 94,358
author: frenchmartini
